bibl.title: Ptolemy XII Auletes and the Romans.
bibl.note: Some recent papyrological findings and a re-valuation of existing evidence allow for a better appreciation of the constraints under which Ptolemy XII was forced to operate both inside and outside his kingdom.
bibl.seg: SIANI-DAVIES Mary, Ptolemy XII Auletes and the Romans.

Some recent papyrological findings and a re-valuation of existing evidence allow for a better appreciation of the constraints under which Ptolemy XII was forced to operate both inside and outside his kingdom.
